original_title: Bonksters Gross Science: Slugs Snails and Other Slimy Creatures
overview: Join the Bonksters for a lesson in Gross Science, this time they're going to investigate some really gooey creatures! Try not to cover your eyes as we enter the world of critters that give goo and ooze a whole new meaning! It's Bonksters Gross Science: Slugs Snails And Other Slimy Creatures!
title: Bonksters Gross Science: Slugs Snails and Other Slimy Creatures
